auth/expired-action-code: The action code or the link has expired
auth/invalid-action-code: The action code is not valid. This can happen if the code is malformed or ya has been used
auth/user-disabled: The user corresponding to the credential provided has been disabled
auth/ user-not-found: The user does not match any credentials
auth/email-already-in-use: You have a account with the email address provided
auth/invalid-email: The email address is not valid
auth/operation-not-allowed: The corresponding account type this credential is not activated
auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: Electronic mail ya associated with another account
auth/auth-domain-config-required: Not provided the configuration for authentication
auth/credential-already-in-use: There is a account for this credential
auth/operation-not-supported-in-this-env: This operation is not allowed in the environment it takes place. Make sure it must be http or https
auth/timeout: Response time exceeded . It is possible that the domain is not authorized to carry out operations
auth/missing-android-pkg-name: A packet name must be provided to install the Android application
auth/missing-continue-uri: The next URL must be provided in the request
auth/missing-ios-bundle-id: You must provide a package name to install the iOS application
auth/invalid-continue-uri: The following URL provided on the request is not valid
auth/unauthorized-continue-uri: The domain of the following URL is not on the white list
auth /invalid-dynamic-link-domain: The dynamic link domain provided, the configuration in the current project is not authorized
auth/argument-error: Check the configuration of the link for the application
auth /invalid-persistence-type: The specified data persistence type is not valid
auth/unsupported-persistence-type: The current environment does not support the specified type for data persistence
auth/invalid-credential: The credential has expired or is malformed
auth /invalid-verification-code: The credential verification code is not valid
auth/invalid-verification-id: The credential verification ID is not valid
auth/custom-token-mismatch: The token is different from the requested standard
auth/invalid-custom-token: The token provided is not valid
auth/captcha-check-failed: The reCAPTCHA response token is not valid, the domain has expired is not allowed
auth/invalid-phone-number: The phone number is in a format not valid (standard E.164)
auth/quota-exceeded: If the SMS quota has been exceeded
auth/cancelled -popup-request: A popup window request is only allowed at the time
auth/popup-blocked: The browser has blocked the popup window
auth/popup-closed-by-user: The user closes the emerging window without completing the login on the provider
auth/unauthorized-domain: The application domain is not authorized to perform operations
auth/invalid-user-token: The current user has not been identified
auth/user-token-expired: The current user token has expired
auth/app -not-authorized: Application not authorized to authenticate with the given key
auth/invalid-api-key: The API key provided is not valid
auth/requires-recent-login: The last user access time does not comply with the security limit
auth/too-many-requests: The requests were blocked due to an unusual activity. Vuelva the attempt after a time
auth/web-storage-unsupported: The browser in the browser It is compatible with the storage if the user has disabled this function
auth/invalid-claims: The valid custom registry attributes in son
auth/claims-too-large: The size of the request exceeds the maximum allowed size of 1 Megabyte
auth/invalid-argument: If it provided an invalid argument to a method
auth/invalid-creation-time: The creation time must be one closes valid UTC
auth/invalid-disabled-field: The property for the disabled user is not valid
auth/invalid-email-verified: The email address is not valid
auth/invalid-hash-algorithm: The HASH algorithm is not compatible with encryption
auth/invalid-hash-block-size: The HASH -derived block size is not valid
auth/invalid-hash-derived-key-length: The HASH -derived key size is not valid
auth/invalid-hash-key: The HASH key must have a valid byte buffer
auth/invalid-hash-memory-cost: The costo de la memory HASH is not valid
auth/invalid-hash-parallelization: The parallel load HASH is not valid
auth/invalid-hash-rounds: El redondeo HASH is not valid
auth/invalid-hash-salt-separator: The SALT separator field of the HASH generation algorithm must be a valid byte buffer
auth/invalid-id-token: The token code entered is not valid
auth/invalid-last-sign- in-time: Last login time must be a valid UTC lock
auth/invalid-page-token: The following URL provided in the request is not valid
auth/invalid-password: The password is not valid, it must be at least 6 characters long
auth/invalid-password-hash: The password HASH is not valid
auth/invalid-password -salt: The SALT password is not valid
auth/invalid-photo-url: The URL of the user's photo is not valid
auth/invalid-provider-id: The identifier of the user non-compatible provider
auth/invalid-session-cookie-duration: The duration of the COOKIE of the session must be a valid number in milliseconds, between 5 minutes and 2 weeks
auth/invalid-uid: The provided identifier must have a maximum of 128 characters
auth/invalid-user-import: The user record to import is not valid
auth/invalid-provider- data: The data provider is not valid
auth/maximum-user-count-exceeded: If you have exceeded the maximum allowed number of users to import
auth/missing-hash-algorithm: It is necessary to provide the HASH generation algorithm and its parameters to import users
auth/missing-uid: An identifier is required for the current operation
auth/reserved-claims: Merge custom properties will provide used reserved words
auth/uid-alread-exists: El Identifier provided ya is in use
auth/email-already-exists: The electronic mail provided is in use
auth/phone-number-already-exists: The telephone provided is in use
auth/insufficient-permission: The credential used to access the requested resource
auth/internal-error: The authentication server found an unexpected error while trying to process the request
